s.text: My point was merely that our double-standard with regard to Nazism and Communism is curious, and largely because of lingering (and I think mistaken) notions that somehow the Communists weren't quite so bad.

My point was merely that our double-standard with regard to Nazism and Communism is curious, and largely because of lingering (and I think mistaken) notions that somehow the Communists weren't quite so bad.
